description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. 8bit styled action game from video game composer Yuzo Koshiro's development studio, Ancient. Defeat all monsters by 4 unique heros to protect your princess.
description.short: 8bit styled action game from video game composer Yuzo Koshiro's development studio, Ancient. Defeat all monsters by 4 unique heros to protect your princess.
